questions: Is there an image of a character whose aura is being graded? Answer with yes or no.
Is the image cropped to the size of a real card? Answer with yes or no.
Does the label at the top have the title 'GNRLYXYZ'? Answer with yes or no.
Is '1/1' displayed directly below 'GNRLYXYZ' on the label? Answer with yes or no.
Is there a barcode placed beneath the '1/1'? Answer with yes or no.
Is the grade label displayed on the right side of the label at the top? Answer with yes or no.
Is the numeric grade from the scale displayed below the grade label? Answer with yes or no.
Is the certification number displayed below the numeric grade? Answer with yes or no.
Is all text on the label uniform in size? Answer with yes or no.
Is there balanced padding from the border for all text on the label? Answer with yes or no.
Is the display placed on a white background? Answer with yes or no.
Is the full display shown without any text or labels on the card? Answer with yes or no.
model_output:
No - The image does not depict a card with an aura being graded; it shows a person holding a glowing orb.
No - The image is not cropped to the size of a real card; it depicts a scene in a library with a person.
No - The image does not feature the title 'GNRLYXYZ' at the top; it shows a person holding an orb.
No - There is no '1/1' displayed below 'GNRLYXYZ'; the image doesn't have any text labels.
No - There is no barcode beneath '1/1'; the image lacks any form of labeling or numbering.
No - There is no grade label displayed on the right side; the image contains no labels.
No - A numeric grade is not displayed below a grade label; there are no labels present.
No - A certification number is not displayed below a numeric grade; the image has no labels.
No - There is no uniform text size since there is no text; the image is of a person and orb.
No - The image does not exhibit balanced padding for text because there is no text present.
No - The display is not on a white background; it shows a dark library setting.
No - There is no full display without text; the image does not depict a card or labels.
